text: @bbcnickrobinson This highly informed and perceptive academic sees and spells out the connection between #coronavirus and #Brexit. You ought to get him on @BBCr4today to compensate for that slot given to Cummings' wife and to show respect for listeners' intelligence.  https://t.co/YN7IXaXKjq
